title: does riot give free 3 rp?
body: I have 122 rp and need 3 rp for a hextech key would riot give that to me if so how? {{champion:238}}

replies.body: We might be able to work something out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) so we can help individually with this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
